historyItem.sql: SELECT A. RESERV_NO , SUM(A.QUANTITY) 구매수량 FROM ORDER_INFO A , (SELECT A.RESERV_NO 예약번호 FROM RESERVATION A,(SELECT CUSTOMER_ID FROM( SELECT A.CUSTOMER_ID, B.CUSTOMER_NAME ,A.BRANCH ,COUNT(B.CUSTOMER_NAME) 방문횟수 , SUM(VISITOR_CNT) 방문고객수 FROM RESERVATION A, CUSTOMER B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID AND CANCEL ='N' GROUP BY A.CUSTOMER_ID, B.CUSTOMER_NAME ,A.BRANCH ORDER BY 4 DESC) WHERE ROWNUM =1) B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID and CANCEL ='N') B WHERE A. RESERV_NO = B.예약번호 GROUP BY A. RESERV_NO;
